creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: Milestone moved to 1.2.2 because 1.2.1 is already released.

there is javascript code to check for this, can you make sure the javascript
loads correctly?
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
the javascript code is not delievered (we have a problem with this particular
installation - didn't realize that, sorry!); all works well on other installations
